snippet: Eight soldiers are charged in Pvt. Danny Chen’s death in Afghanistan, and if they are court-martialed, their cases will be handled in North Carolina.
abstract: Trials for eight soldiers charged in Pvt Danny Chen’s death in Afghanistan are to be held at North Carolina's Fort Bragg if senior military officials decide courts-martial are warranted; soldiers are charged with involuntary manslaughter and negligent homicide.
lead_paragraph: Eight soldiers are charged in Pvt. Danny Chen’s death in Afghanistan, and if they are court-martialed, their cases will be handled in North Carolina.

headline.seo: Any Trials in Pvt. Danny Chen’s Death Will Be in U.S., Military Says
headline.main: Any Trial in Soldier’s Death Would Be at Fort Bragg
headline.print_headline: Any Trial in Soldier’s Death Would Be at Fort Bragg

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
